title: Apple Intelligence
update: Apple Intelligence combines the power of generative models with personal context to deliver intelligence that's useful and relevant to the user.

title: Apple Vision Pro
update: Apple's entry into the virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) headset market, with a higher price point than any competing product, but with plenty of features to justify that expense.

title: Samsung Galaxy Ring
update: Samsung's new smart ring, enabling users to track their sleep patterns and spot potential signs of sleep apnea, with features like blood oxygen and body temperature tracking, medication reminders, and alerts regarding interactions between medications.

title: Apple Watch X
update: A thinner, sleeker watch, celebrating the tenth birthday of the Apple Watch, with rumored design and feature updates.

title: Eargo 7
update: A cutting-edge hearing aid, offering innovative features in the hearing care industry.
